items.title: WELL AP Complete Exam Prep Course

visible_instructors.name: Nishtha
visible_instructors.title: Nishtha Sadana | Architect | LEED Green Associate | WELL AP
visible_instructors.job_title: Architect | LEED Green Associate | WELL AP
visible_instructors.display_name: Nishtha Sadana | Architect | LEED Green Associate | WELL AP

items.headline: Exam Prep Course prepared by an experienced WELL AP | One on one experience on how to pass the WELL AP test
objectives_summary: The whole course is derived from the WELL AP Complete Study Guide, which is the best-selling WELL Building study guide that has been adopted by many universities and professionals as primary course material throughout the United States.
The course covers the complete WELL AP exam scope and will enable students to pass their WELL AP exam on their first-try, with absolute enthusiasm and confidence
The course tagets the students interested in learning about wellness in buildings and enables them to truly learn the real reasons behind the WELL principles.
